name: Idlers And Dungeons
description:
In this Idle Game RPG you can Level up your character while doing other things. This is a unique game system based on rpg old school game mixed with idling.Most actions are done from UI menus and enemies are not seen during the fight.
Go to the shop and buy some useful items which will help you on your adventures and quests.
Be the hero you always wanted to be and if you are lucky, you will find the legendary chuck norris beard !

Good luck and happy hunting !
